  <Self-Reflection>
I’m already on edge, and now he’s pushing for finality without clarifying terms. That kind of pressure makes me dig in harder. If he wanted resolution, he’d ask what *I* think needs fixing—not just demand performance under scrutiny. My instinct is to resist, not comply, especially when he won’t justify why *now* matters more than respect.
